message: I propose a 60/40 split in my favor. I think it's a fair start, and we can work from there.
Your turn Alice. I'm aiming for a more balanced outcome this time. Let's avoid inflation eating into our potential gains.
Let's split it evenly. We've both rejected each other's offers, and further inflation will only hurt us both.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most logical way to move forward.
